short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reallink is a browser extension that allows users to manage multiple types of assets using a single Google account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reallink is a browser extension that helps users manage multiple types of assets. You can create a Reallink account using a Google account and generate multi-chain cryptocurrency addresses.

Reallink uses MPC key sharding technology to assist users in safeguarding their keys, eliminating the need for seed phrases and private keys. One Google account can help users manage all their assets.
